titleInfo.title: University of Colorado Mandolin Club and Glee Club

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 4 x 5 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: On envelope: "#203 Weinberger Family of Arizona, 1887-1963 B 13 B17 B 18-2 prints B21 - 4 prints B24 - 2 check copy of buggy photo for info." Handwritten on back of photograph: "The Mandolin Club and Glee Club, University of Colorado, 1902. Jacob Weinberger was a member, #203."

mods.abstract: Group of men in tuxedos with instruments, members of the Mandolin and Glee Clubs of the University of Colorado. Jacob Weinberger was a member.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
